hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Heart Container#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Bombchus (10 pieces)# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Bomb Bag# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Heart Container#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #3 Deku Scrubs#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #2# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #Epona's Song#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern MQ Iron Boots Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #1# major item.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Bug Bottle# and #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Third Left Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #3# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Huge Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial First Left Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Key#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #1# major item.

SFM (Saria).text: I've heard Ganon dislikes lemon-flavored popsicles.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #Twinrova#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Right

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #Morpha#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree MQ Before Spinning Log Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #generic grotto#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #symphony in the Spirit Temple# yields #a Heart Container#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Symphony Room Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: Did you know that the solution to the Truth Spinner in Shadow Temple is never one of the two positions closest to the initial position?

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
